game.name: Witch Epoch
game.shortDescription: Witch Epoch is a game about a Witch fighting in the otherworld with various monsters that are getting stronger every time, collecting colored bonuses the player can cause damage and if the color of the bonus matches the color of the monster's weakness, then he will receive maximum damage!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Witch Epoch is a game about a Witch fighting in the otherworld with various monsters that are getting stronger every time, collecting colored bonuses the player can cause damage and if the color of the bonus matches the color of the monster's weakness, then he will receive maximum damage!

reviewHighlights.text: this game is just those space ship shooter dodge games... just, with a female flying? idk, its honestly stupid, and werid... and boring... and I cheat...
